meanings.definition: A breed of cattle with short horns.
meanings.sent1: The farmer raised shorthorns on his farm.
meanings.sent2: The shorthorns grazed peacefully in the pasture.
meanings.sent3: The shorthorns decided to have a horn-growing contest for fun.
meanings.sent4: The shorthorns stood out in the field like proud kings with their short horns.
meanings.sent5: The children loved visiting the shorthorns at the petting zoo because of their short horns.

meanings.sent1: We bought shorthorns for our ranch.
meanings.sent2: The shorthorns were known for their gentle nature.
meanings.sent3: The shorthorns organized a 'Moo of the Year' competition.
meanings.sent4: The shorthorns roamed the plains like a spotted sea of short-horned creatures.
meanings.sent5: The shorthorns' short horns made them easily recognizable among the other cattle.
